content.detailedDescription: On july 15th 2013, a little after 9pm, at a concert at fiddler's green, with my husband, i noticed an object traveling very fast towards the venue from the northwest. there had been several airplanes flying overhead occasionally, however, this did not look or move like a plane or a helicopter. right after i noticed it, the craft slowed down and hovered for a few seconds, then it circled around back and forth on the west side of fiddler's green. i immediately thought it was something odd and turned my husbands attention to it so he could tell me what he thought. he also thought it was something odd, and not just a plane or helicopter. we had never seen anything identifiable move in all directions like that. when it was at it's closest point to us we could both clearly see it's green, blue, red and white lights pulsating and definitely saw it spinning. you can hear me say it in the video. i started recording after viewing it for about a minute and a half. the object seemed curious, as if it were scouting the area, particularly the venue we were at. after circling a couple of times it headed back northwest out of our sight. i couldn't decide if it was something military or something "not of this world". i have been very interested in unexplained phenomenon for many years, so i have been excited and curious to find out what it is we actually witnessed, and if anyone else witnessed it. i was completely sober, unlike many of the people there at the concert, so my vision and perception of what i saw was definitely clear.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Disc shaped, glowing craft quickly came towards location then hovered back and forth before it left.

content.detailedDescription: I had two abductions.  one in 1974 and the other in east texas 1996. i know 1974 was long ago, but i didn't want people to think i was crazy and have held this inside for many years and only now feel like i can tell. i was 26, married, had 4 children.  it was about 7pm, dark, winter time, i was driving home and felt like someone was watching me.  i couldn't shake the feeling.  i had to calm myself down.  and then, i was at home. that confused me.  i went on to bed that night, not remembering the fear i had earlier of someone following me. suddenly, i was awake and staring into the big black eyes of a creature, standing on my right side. his arms were long and he was just skinny and a grey appearance.  i tried to scream, but couldn't. nor could i move.  i could see my husband sleeping in my peripheral view.  as i said, the creature was at my right side, and three others, much smaller standing at the foot of the bed.  i felt like the one at my right, was some kind of instructor and the three were learning from him.  they seemed a little afraid of me and huddled close.  then the one close to me spoke to my mind and i understood his thoughts.  he said, "i won't hurt you, and you won't ever remember this."  then, he took an instrument like a pen with a light and touched my upper groin area. it was then, i remember being naked. and as he ran this pen object down from my groin, and down my upper thigh, i started screaming from the pain, only no sounds were coming out.  i screamed for my husband to wake up and help me.  it felt like the object was pulling all of my tissue out of my leg, extracting everything away.  he took  the object to my right above my knee and pulled it away.  he was right, the next morning, i remembered nothing.  but i started having nightmares.  they were all the same; a huge black spider coming down his web from the ceiling to hurt me.  i would jump out of bed, screaming, and take whatever object that was near me and start swinging, screaming, "get away from me!"  my husband, of course, would wake up and try to to calm me down.  he was clearly shaken by this strange behavior of mine.  it frightened him.  after the third nightmare, and reaction to it being the same; i then remembered.  i was terrified, and worried that if i told my husband he would think i went insane.  so i said nothing.  after remembering, the nightmares ended.  the second one was when i lived in east texas.  i was 48.  i was at home alone asleep.  my husband a truck driver was gone. i woke up and saw flashing red, yellow, blue, green lights in a circled pattern in my front yard. i was watching them from my bed.  the pattern seemed to be going around a dark disk shape. suddenly, i wasn't in my bed anymore but on a steel oblong table.  the same grey (instructor i'll call him) spoke to me telepathically, "i won't hurt you."  i spoke back telepathically, "that's what you said to me the last time. you lied."  there were other greys around the table 4-5 watching.  he took out an instrument and ran it slowly over my brain like doing a massage. it was shaped like a pen also with a light.  as he moved the pen to different areas of my brain, the sensation was so euphoric, i really didn't want him to stop. i never experienced such sensation. then when he was done, he spoke again, "see, i told you so."  and as odd as it seemed, it looked like he was pleased in my response.  and strangely, as well, i wasn't afraid any more of him.  my first two husbands passed away without me telling about this.  my third husband i told, but he just can't believe it.  there is a friend who found out about my story, and he was ecstatic.  he also is a believer and had several visitations.  it felt so good to be around other people who have experienced an encounter with aliens.  i have no proof except i have osteoporosis, had 3 hip replacements. the right hip had to have another one only three years later.  the doctor said, i just didn't have enough bone.  i wonder if it wasn't from the first abduction on my right leg.  i wish i had more evidence.  if i get to meet this instructor again, i feel in my inner being, he would let me ask questions. but thanks for being out there for all of us who have had the experience.  it is such a relief, to know we are not crazy.  ps my occupation: retired register nurse.
content.summary: Extracting substance (bone marrow?) from my right groin area and thigh

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a glowing light in the sky i got my binoculars to have a look, i saw a glowing white ufo then saw 2 orbs flying around it and then they joined up together, after 15 minutes a plane flew by, the ufo flew to the northeast it then flew near the plane very fast and returned in the same spot near my house after 30 seconds, while i was trying to take some photos the ufo went in and out of the clouds, i felt it was playing with me i would wave it to come out and it did, as i tried to take a photo it would go back in the clouds,i eventually got some photos and video.
content.summary: Ufo in melbourne australia

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and i were sitting on our back porch in the evening as the sun was getting low. suddenly the ufo came over our house. our backs were facing the house, so we were surprised when we saw it because we did not hear anything. we had just seen an airplane before we saw the ufo. the plane was much higher and left a vapor trail. this thing seemed much closer. we could look almost directly under it. no wings, no tail. it was aluminum colored and seemed to have a dark band of color about halfway on the body. though the shape was cigar shaped it sometimes seemed to almost be elongated peanut shaped. we observed it moving at a moderate pace until it went out of sight and then it was back suddenly, like instantaneously, then traveled west, the same route that the plane we saw earlier traveled. the ufo left no vapor trail. when i first saw this thing i knew it was no plane. i was constantly wondering "what is this"?
content.summary: Traveled n-s went out of sight then back suddenly and traveled w.Daytime.

content.detailedDescription: At the time of the incident my wife and i were awakened by the sound of our four dogs barking excitedly, what really startled us was that they were all staring towards the same direction of north in the sky ; which was the first time my own animals made created a eerie feeling . it seemed to surreal of a sight as if the red glowing animated ball of emitting light was hovering within the stratosphere without a sound to us but obviously ; if you are familiar with the sensitive hearing of dogs , then you would probably understand. as if they were in a barking trance , continually for over 5 minutes and suddenly it disappeared only to resurface approximately 2-3 min. later ;along with the barking again . in total it appeared 3 different times until if finally never appeared again, lasting around ten min. all together. in amazement, i happen to come across an article on the mufon web site stating in fowler ca. ;near fresno ca. that had been reported a few years later of a very shockingly similar siting and that is what prompted me to report my story.
content.summary: Red light

content.detailedDescription: These are a few photos viewed from my backyard at around 6:30pm. my wife and i both witnessed around 9 ufo,s over a 5 min period then they just decided they had finished whatever it was they were doing, and as quickly as they appeared they disappeared! they were moving in all directions, stopping and then continuing in opposite directions.  absolutely no sounds heard.  then they would light up from red, then change to white in no real pattern.  you have to realize how far away these are.  i was watching the sky and noticed two of them go in front of the daytime moon, then my wife came out.  i yelled at her to grab the camera and tripod so she did.   and to notice them in broad daylight because of the lights on them, they must have been very bright.  if you look under all of them it looks like some kind of exhaust or propulsion coming from them. my wife was a skeptic but i can truly say she isn't anymore.   the last photo is the vessel shape. you need to know that they appeared as a bright little star to the naked eye then when they all appeared they were flashing bright red and white colors and moving up down and sideways  with very sharp and decisive moves. the fourth photo was taken with my cannon 300x zoom then computer zoomed 1000x's more. you see these objects were about 22miles straight up....
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I apologize for the blurriness however the objects where at around 20,000' to 25,000' or about 25 miles straight up. and i was so excited and so shaky.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and myself were lying down in the grass talking. we both were looking up at the sky when all of a sudden a bright object was comeing down very very fast. we thought it was a falling star but all of a sudden it stopped. it stayed stationary for awhile and then it went straight up very fast and disappeared. all we said to each other was "did you see what i saw?"
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A object was falling down to earth

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking up at the stars, when i thought i saw a satellite. i noticed it was going some what faster than a satellite. i than thought it was a local plane. 

the dull light, as compared to the stars started getting a clear bright, it also seem to get several times its original size. it got several times brighter than the moon like a cars headlight from a distance.  the light quckly went back to dull than it was gone.

very clear warm night, no clouds, evening mist or any fog like conditions.

i'm thinking maybe space debris, but it had several seconds as one britness than went to another than gone?
content.summary: Dull light that got very bright and larger went back to dull than gone

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to let dog out before bed. was looking at the stars overhead through some broken clouds. some movement caught my eye right overheard. first though it was meteor. then six objects came into view overhead flying toward the west. there were two groups of three objects flying in a two tight, parallel triangluar formations. they glowed (or relflected city lights) a lighter blue than the surrounding sky. there was no decernable sound from the objects. first thought it was birds, but the formation was too tight and birds don't fly that late. they moved across my field of view in a few seconds behind the neighbouring house. altitude was difficult to gauge but they were flying below the broken clouds overheard.
content.summary: Two groups of three objects flew overhead toward the west. no sound. objects glowed, reflected light.

content.detailedDescription: Basically i will break down the sighting into two parts, it happened around midnight, i spotted a large white sphere orbiting the 3/4 moon, after a minute the sphere blinked out and appeared probably 1000 miles from its original lunar orbit, a minute passed again and the sphere blinked out and reappear in its original lunar orbit,it did this several times, it was enough time to get corroborating witness, then it vanished, i work odd hours so im used to being out in the middle of the night, i like to stargaze, approximately an hour later i stepped outside again for a smoke and this is when the 2nd sighting happened,(no corroborating witness this time), only reason i looked up was i heard a small propjob plane go by with its classic light pattern, after the plane passed thats when i noticed a sphere flashing  all colours of the spectrum above the tree line but right below the clouds so probably a few miles up from my south westerly line of sight, it was very odd, it was bright like a star but multicolored and definitely in earths lower atmosphere, weird thing about was as i was watching i noticed i could not keep my eyes focused on it even though it was stationary,by this time i was very intrigued about what this thing in the sky could be, i happened to have my 350 lumen led work light with me, i proceeded to shine my light at this hanging anomaly in different strobe patterns, as i did this the wavelength of colors started to change and the object started list left and right and up and down but still staying in its general original sighting area, when i could focus my eyes on it the the colors were amazing, this all took place within a 1 to 2 hour time frame, then at which the object slowly moved northwest gaining altitude till it disappeared behind the tree line from my line of sight. im pretty familiar with things in the sky and this was something very exotic!
content.summary: Like a very bright star flashing all colours of the spectrum, hard to keep eyes focused on it although close  observors local..

content.detailedDescription: July 4, 2013, between 10:30-11 pm i was sitting outside facing north w my boyfriend when i saw something bright or burning descending towards us.  at first glance i thought it was an ember from fireworks falling because it was so bright but it wasn't falling, rather it was hovering slowly from east to west.  it seemed to descend closer to us and move even more slowly to the west.  we were debating what it could be.  the only thing i'm familiar w that could fly like that is a helicopter.  it had been cloudy/rainy off/on all day so we were wondering aloud if it was a helicopter with its searchlight turned on but obscured by clouds.  even while speculating we knew it was unlike any helo or aircraft we've seen before.  it was completely silent.  in simplest terms it was like a ball of fire in the sky that randomly varied in brightness and color.  it didn't have defined edges rather it was hazy or diffuse.  i kept thinking that as it seemed to descend lower (and glow brighter orange) it would be more discernible but the closer it got it seemed more blurry.  it seemed to follow an east to west course.  at its closest though (maybe 100 feet? hard to judge distance and size) it looked like the fire/glow seemed to emit upwards from a flat bottom (saucer shaped?); the fireball looked more dome shaped closer.  i couldn't discern a flat bottom but only briefly it did appear the light wasn't emitting downwards due to some straight line boundary. when it was further away it seemed round/oval and the light appeared to emit/radiate evenly in all directions)  it moved so slowly and at first stayed as low or lower than a helo would fly.  we observed it for a few minutes feeling mostly in awe and a little frightened.  i went in to get my teenage daughter and her friend and a camera or phone (bf stayed outside).  even though this took maybe one minute by the time i got back outside it had travelled a good distance away (a mile or more maybe) & while the girls saw the bright, flickering light that moved oddly (directional maneuvers like a helicopter but faster than a jet when it left) it was too far away when they came out to be as stunned as my boyfriend and i were.  as it left it appeared to be heading from east to west then arced to the northwest and ascended at an amazing rate of speed.  we were sober btw.  i am so glad my bf saw it too, because he is very practical and would never believe it had he not seen it himself.  i have no idea the size of this thing but if i had to guess i'd say it was probably smaller than a helo.
content.summary: Saw orb (fireball) in sky july 4, 2013, red/orange/white changed colors and varied in brightness/intensity, approached very slowly and silently, no noise, left very quickly

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday july 14, 2013 - 9:00-9:15 p.M. wsw direction about 50deg azimuth

my wife was out at the store and when she came home, she was running into the house and very excited. she told me there was something out by the moon that she had never seen before. when i went out to look, i saw a green, almost "t" shaped object floating around the moon. it looked like it was between me and the moon but stayed close to the moonlight. i would say it was at least 5 miles away, maybe more. it floated around the moon going in counterclockwise cirlces for about 2-3 minutes and i was able to snap a couple of pictures with my phone. after about 4 minutes though it began its departure. it shot south and up and then north and up in a zig zag pattern and then it was gone. it did not accelarate at an unbelievable rate but it was faster than anything i have ever seen. and i live in the air capitol! once i saw it start leaving i ran inside to grab my good camera (my wife is a professional photographer) that would have been much better than my phone. i watched the skies for about another hour afterwards but saw nothing else except a few airplanes pass by. again, i live in an area with a lot of airplane traffic, these were nothing out of the ordianry. i have the pictures i took on my phone and i have the negatives to prove they werent photoshopped. i have played with some editing software a bit to try and clear the pictures up but the phone's camera severely limited me. i made some crops so the entity could be seen better. i also have the originals.
content.summary: Green "t" shaped entity seen near moon

content.detailedDescription: Watched large object with pulsing blue white and red lights for over an hour with 4 others on lee cline rd
content.summary: Watched large object with pulsing blue white and red lights for over an hour with 4 others on lee cline rd.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking in the hallway of our house when i looked up at the big windows in the living room, i noticed a triangular shape object with
 reddish color circular orbs at each end of the
 points. i told my husband to look out the window at it and that's when we saw two more
 circular orbs under the triangular shape object. we both told each other that we have never seen anything like this. we watched for
 about six minutes until they just disappeared.
 this objects made no noise, and would change
color to bright orangish to yellow and back to red. these colors looked like a flames inside the circular objects. and when the two orbs under the triangle would move from right to left it was with very fast speed.  we where in all at
what we had just seen, and knowing we have never in our lives seen anything like it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We saw five objects and three where in a triangle shape, and two others objects where under the triangular shape. and would move with great speed. this lasted for six minutes. then  they just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was sleeping in my bedroom 
2. i had awoken and sat up to a bright light shinning in my eyes and thought it was very weird.
3. i didn't have much thought during the time.
4. i couldn't really see anything except what looked like a dark gray space ship hovering above my window. the light was too bright to see much more.
5. when i awoke to this i wasn't afraid, just confused about what it was. when i went back to bed i did not truly awake back to my normal state until i received my normal phone call at 6:30am. i told him when i answered that i just had the weirdest dream! 
6. the object looked as if it disappeared by transforming and then it was gone.
content.summary: I saw a bright light from outside my window. it blinded my eyes like a bright light would. i remember thinking/saying this is weird. then all i remember is going back to sleep.

content.detailedDescription: I live near disneyland and while i was going out to roll up my car windows, i looked east towards santiago college right along chapman ave. i looked around because it was so quiet and not a plane in the sky. that's when i noticed a very bright blue green ball of light i thought was a meteor or something traveling parallel to the horizon. but it sped up and stopped on a dime without slowing down just laser fast to zero in a blink of an eye, then accelerate like no kind of terrestrial craft even dreamed of yet...Much less manufactured. it hovered  for about 10 sec  wiggling left right up down then it flew up at about a 45' angle then dropped back at the opposite angle toward the ground and stopped again and moved left to right slowly and instantly dropped yet again at an amazing burst of speed and stopped again for about 5 sec. finally  looping back south toward the ground and out of my sight. the way it made deliberate turns stops accelerated, decelerated, flew forward and backwards with pin ball maneuvers  is evident it is not an organic ball of ice, iron, rock  ricocheting around our airspace, nor is it an earthly aircraft. that craft was under intelligent control, possibly remotely, possibly internally, who knows! like i said the skies were so strangely vacant at that time and what ever that was had the spot light at center stage and wasn't trying to hide. c'mon people someone out either looking towards trabuco canyon or living there had to see this too. where ya at. no you're not losing it that was the real deal.
content.summary: Bright turquoise ball traveled south to north from 22frwy & 57 ascened quickly zig zagged bursted forward then dropped like a rock and stopped in mid air  went up then down like a pin ball & rt then lft

content.detailedDescription: On front yard with children watching neighborhood fireworks viewed red glowing slow moving orb/ufo/circular object south up in the sky moving south east then disappeared up in sky. had son record it.
content.summary: On front yard watching neighborhood fireworks viewed red glowing slow moving orb/ufo/circular object then disappeared up orks when sudden

content.detailedDescription: I was on the computer, my boyfriend was going towards the backyard to light a fire..He came to a stop when he saw a big, bright triangle in the sky. at first he thought it was a fire in the distance, but realized it was up in the sky. he dropped what he was holding and ran into the house to get me, he told me to come see this "big orange triangle" in the sky..When i got outside it was still there, there were tree's in the way at first so i had to try to get a visual. then i saw what he told me about, a big, bright orange triangle..He told me it had gotten smaller since he was outside and then while i was watching it, it got smaller, seemed more like a circle but it might be because it was disappearing off in the distance. we both felt very creeped out, because we couldn't think of a single explination. we stood there for a few minutes and we both saw a huge shooting star (meteor), and then watched a plane flying in the opposite direction. what we saw was definitely unexplainable, and was not an air plane, a star, or a helicopter.
content.summary: Big, bright, orange perfect triangle that got smaller then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to check on my hound dog who was barking, after checking on him i was looking up at the stars and moon.  i noticed right above me in the north sky it looked like to airplanes flying side by side in sequence, the reason that i thought this was, the lights looked like normal airplane lights at first. i thought man that is a big plane, then i thought well that is two planes flying together.  then as it passed over, the lights turned a different direction, from n to nw, but when they turned, they turned together like a solid object, and went from being side by side to one set of flashing lights in the front and another set in the back, that is when i really could see a little detail of something connecting the two sets of flashing lights, it looked like a cylinder, it was dark out, but the moonlight helped a lot.  the lights at first, like i stated before were flashing the normal airplane colors, but when it turned they started flashing blue, white, gold, read, orange, green, the blue, then white.  it was very strange, and very large. airplanes fly over my home every day and night, and i have never seen anything as big, nor with the colors of light, and with the shape that it appeared to have.  i witnessed this from about 5 to 7 minutes, until it kept its nw direction and got out of my sight, the last thing i saw was a white pulsating light in the distance.
content.summary: Thought it was two airplanes flying in sequence side by side, then it turned and it looked like a cylinder, it was huge, when it turned the lights went from side by side to front to back

content.detailedDescription: On friday july 12,2013....I was dropping friend off in west brantford at 10 pm when we noticed 5 objects rise in the sw direction from the treetops. they were bright like fire balls and hovered in the sky. i began my video on my iphone but could only capture 3 of them, but there was 5 in the sky. as one disappeared, another one would rise from the tree tops. after a couple min of watching we decided to go in the direction that they were spotted. we lost site of them so we turned around, when we got back to his place we saw another one rise. if you notice on the 11 second video if you zoom in at the end, it seems there is more of a vehicle structure attached to the light. in total we saw approximately 8-9 orbs
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Orbs rising in horizon, hovered then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was out front smoking a cigarette, looking up at the stars & a line of 3 stars caught my attention when the right one started to move. it started heading over my house but changed direction very quickly multiple times before heading off over the trees nw of me. i initially thought it was a plane, but noticed that the planes were flying overhead alot lower and you could hear them easily since the airport isn't too far away. the speed of this thing was incredible. there was another one that looked as if it were flashing brightly every once in a while as well. i ran inside to grab my camera and when i came back out, i saw a third object following close to the same path as the first one & the second one that was flashing brightly was gone. unfortunately my camera wasn't able to pick it up as it looked like a moving star...
content.summary: 3 stars & 1 started moving

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were walking north on broad st. and turned left on east front street (heading west).  we noticed 3 bright lights in the sky to our right (north).  we then walked right on boat club court to walk north to get closer to the objects, stopping at the intersection of boat club court and union street to take out my iphone.  i took one photo and one video of 3 bright lights over and beyond the navesink river, in a north-northeast direction.  the lights hovered and wobbled in the distance; they moved together in a path, and one-by-one vanished.  then another bright light appeared through the clouds, followed the same path as the 3 before it, and then also vanished.  about 4 minutes later, about 2 jets (with contrail and blinking lights) flew past from west to east in the area where the bright lights had been.  then we noticed what we thought was a helicopter (blinking lights and hovered) in the distance, also near where the bright objects appeared.
content.summary: Viewed 3 bright lights facing north-east over navesink river; stationary, then moved, then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Was about midnight, was sitting on my porch smoking a cigarette when i was observing the night sky. we had a major storm blow thru the region earlier that day, which caused power outage, so i was able to look at the night sky and see the stars. there was no cloud cover, and dont recall the moon being out at the time.

i was looking in a northernly direction when i viewed these 2 orange colored lights traveling together in a straight line. what struck me as odd was they stayed in a perfect 'formation', one never led or fell behind the other, it was if they were 'attached' and moving across the sky at a pretty fast rate of speed. they seemed to be at a high altitude, as i watched them, i viewed a lower flying conventional aircraft traveling se to nw, intersecting the lights' flight path below them. 

i watched the lights travel across the viewable sky for about 10 minutes until i lost sight of them behind trees in the south.
content.summary: Two orange spheres traveling from n to s

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting on rear deck of house speaking with daughter when i noticed first two,then two more orange sphere shaped objects moving due north ,approx 1 mile away and perhaps 700-1000 ft. in altitude, we watched them for approx. two minutes then they all vanished.Was  a little perplexed as to what they were as there was no sound nor identification lights as one would see from an aircraft.
content.summary: Observerd 4 orange globes traveling due north,approx 700 ft. heighth,slight variance in direction and alltitude from all till they all abruptly vanished

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday, july 14, 2013 a friend and i were taking our dogs for their nightly walk.  we typically go around 9 pm after the heat of the day wanes, but last night we got a late start.  i left my house at 10:10 pm.  i'm sure of this time because, i was using my pedometer on my phone and it records the time.  i had paused just after beginning the pedometer to text my friend because i had seen flashes of lightening and wanted to make certain he still wanted to go.  since we didn't know whether the lightening was heat lightening or the precursor to a storm, we decided to go ahead with the walk.  

based upon the information on my pedometer, i probably met my friend about 10:20 pm.  since it was so late, we decided to cut the walk short.  we were going to take the alley on the west side of the bartholomew county public library, which intersects with 7th street.  just after we entered the alley (at approximately 6th street), my friend pointed towards the sky and said, "look at that."  we have often talked about the fact that he typically is not very observant, so it was surprising that he had noticed the object in the sky. i glanced to where he was pointing, a bit eastward of the alley that we were standing in. once again, based upon my calculations from my pedometer, this would have been approximately 10:30 pm eastern time on sunday, july 14, 2013.

my first thought upon seeing the object was that it was a hot air balloon.  however, i was surprised that a hot air balloon was flying at night.  my friend and i, both, had the impression that this object was a balloon.  however, whereas i thought it was a hot air balloon, he thought it was a helium balloon.  the object, orb like, glowed a reddish-orange against the night sky.  the reason i thought it was a not air balloon was because it appeared to have a flame beneath it, that glowed a yellowy gold color.  both of us thought that it was the flame that was reflecting up into the object, giving it the reddish-orange color.  as the object passed directly overhead, i could see that it did not have the standard gondola that hot air balloons have.  it also appeared that it wasn't as big as a hot air balloon in diameter.  years ago when i lived in florida, i lived in a flight path for hot air balloons.  i watched several pass over my house almost on a regular basis.  although i couldn't determine just how high up this object was, what i was aware of, was that from the distinction that we could see, that it would have been close enough that i could have heard the flame of the fire going into the balloon, if it had been a hot air balloon.  besides, having watched so many hot air balloons pass over, i knew that they don't have the fire burning all the time, but that the flame is shot up in spurts as needed.  this object was traveling across the sky at a very level pattern.  as, i said, i don't know how high the object was, but it was below the cloud bank.  

the other thing that i noticed was that although we watched this object for 5 - 10 minutes, that it was traveling at a much quicker speed than what a hot air balloon travels, typically.  but it was certainly not as fast as what an airplane would travel, nor did this object in any way resemble an airplane.  my friend's initial impression was that it was a large helium balloon with a flame beneath it.  so, individually, we both had the impression that this object was balloon shaped and we both had the impression that it had a flame beneath it.  however, the flame was directly beneath it, like a hot air balloon, and this object was traveling across the sky from east to west-northwest.  we watched it until for some time, until we lost it on the horizon in the distance.

i knew that we had seen something out of the ordinary, as in not an airplane or any other typical object we would see traveling in the night sky.  upon arriving home at 10:45, i immediately began searching the internet to see if anyone else had seen the object.  i "googled" various websites, and checked all of the local news outlets, to no avail.  at this point, i am unable to find any other mention of a sighting of this object.
content.summary: Sighted a hot air balloon like object traveling silently in the night sky from east to west.   the object appeared to be a glowing red-orange orb, we thought there was a flame beneath it, which is why we thought it was a hot air balloon.

content.detailedDescription: It was a human like entity that my father-in-law and i observed coming down the street and then when it got close to us it disappeared.  it had a glistening effect that could be described as glass like or cellophane like. this happened on july 4th, 2007.
content.summary: Entity

content.detailedDescription: Bright light travelled rapidly from east to west then accelerated straight at 90 degree with incredible speed.
content.summary: Brighht white round shape moving extremely fast

content.detailedDescription: This report is being submitted by iowa mufon field investigator david kreiter.  the witness, whom i have previously interviewed for an earlier case, reported that she, her mother, and the reporting witness' young son were driving south on interstate 35, south of des moinies, on christmas eve 2004.  they observed what appeared to be very bright "football lights" turn on and then go off, so they pulled off onto the new virginia exit to investigate. they observed an enourmous dark triangular object with circular lights on each corner and a rectangular light partially obscured by slats in the middle of the craft.
content.summary: A huge triangular object off i-35 near des moines, iowa

content.detailedDescription:
Aside from the description above they were in a row with a decent amount of space between them so much so that it appeared there was just one initially then another followed totally 3....Like i said they started out as a glowing ball and then as they sped up and disappeared into the sky heading north east or east they started to get multiable colors of red and orange....At one point the one in the distance appeared to emit bright orange shining up ward from a straight line. 

later some one sent me the "you tube video" tinley ufo sighting 2004 and it is literally without a shred of a doubt the exact thing we all saw.
content.summary: The three of us were on my drive way whe we looked up to see an orange glowing ball moving from south to the north turning norht east.....As they moved away some started to change colors from a single organge ball to red mixed with orange.....T

content.detailedDescription: My partner ran inside telling me to look at what was going on. went outside and saw a red glowing object falling towards the ground. we discussed it and thought it might be a large lantern. then about 4 minutes later i saw another (parachute with a red glow in the middle) above us falling and getting smaller and further away, and then another few minutes went past and we saw another and then another. we could not see any landing, as after a while they just disappeared. sat outside for another 10 minutes and didn't see anything else.
content.summary: Parachute with red glow x4 in 15 minutes falling towards ne
